title: Understanding Herbal Remedies
author: Heather Dale
description: Check out this great listen on Audible.com. If you want to skyrocket your health without wasting money on drugs that can do more harm than good, then keep reading.... Herbal medicine has been used for thousands of years, and it has been regaining in popularity recently, but it still has a lon...

Listeners also enjoyed... - Ancient Remedies - Secrets to Healing with Herbs, Essential Oils, CBD, and the Most Powerful Natural Medicine in History - By: Dr. Josh Axe - Narrated by: Chris Abell - Length: 10 hrs and 7 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story Long before the first pharmaceutical companies opened their doors in the 1850s, doctors treated people, not symptoms. And although we've become used to popping pills, Americans have finally had it with the dangerous side effects, addiction, and over-prescribing - and they're desperate for an alternative. Here's the good news: That alternative has been here all along in the form of ancient treatments used for eons in traditional Chinese, Ayurvedic, and Greek medicine. - - M y Thoughts On this book. \ - By Jeff on 04-01-21 By: [Dr. Josh Axe](/search?searchAuthor=Dr.+Josh+Axe&ref=a_pd_Unders_c5_adblp13npsbx_1_1_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=VBBWGJXPE7P9TSJ5ZVZA&pageLoadId=1HSNo9ODdStk1dCh&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - How to Talk to a Man and Feel Heard: 9 Mistakes Women Need to Avoid - Improve Couples Communication Skills, Reduce Conflict, Repair Your Marriage, and Create a Healthy Relationship - By: Sue Shepard - Narrated by: Jennifer A. Allton - Length: 3 hrs and 41 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story No matter how much you and your husband or boyfriend love each other, sometimes what you say (or don't say) and how you say it can get in the way. This book will show you what could be problematic with your conversations that you aren't even aware of and offer helpful tips and strategies to break old patterns and change the dynamics of how you communicate and connect as a couple. - - Just wonderful! - By Momanator on 05-23-22 By: [Sue Shepard](/author/Sue-Shepard-MFT/B09XKTMWFS?ref=a_pd_Unders_c5_adblp13npsbx_1_2_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=VBBWGJXPE7P9TSJ5ZVZA&pageLoadId=1HSNo9ODdStk1dCh&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Shade Garden Flowers - 5 Simple Steps to Create an Everblooming Garden: How to Raise Flowers That Grow Back Yearly with Little Work - By: Rose White - Narrated by: Mackenzie Summers - Length: 3 hrs - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story Do you ever dream of having a beautiful shade garden all year-round, even if you have never gardened before? Then this is the audiobook for you! In one place, you will find step-by-step directions to growing a garden quickly and easily with very little work or expense. You may think that flowers will not bloom in the shade and that a fabulous garden requires hours of work a week, with lots of time spent weeding and watering. That is not always the case! Here is an alternative gardening method with five easy steps that top gardeners use. - - Very Useful! - By Syed Reza on 07-10-22 By: [Rose White](/author/Rose-White/B093X79RF8?ref=a_pd_Unders_c5_adblp13npsbx_1_3_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=VBBWGJXPE7P9TSJ5ZVZA&pageLoadId=1HSNo9ODdStk1dCh&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Creating Your Permaculture Heaven - How to Design and Create Your Own Backyard Food Forest - By: Nydia Needham - Narrated by: Stephanie Barry - Length: 9 hrs and 3 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story You may think you don't have the time or the money to start a big permaculture project. But permaculture doesn't need to be overwhelming. You can start as small as you like, and you can move at a pace that suits you. Don't feel you have to learn everything in one go and rush out to transform a whole wilderness in a year. Just deal in manageable chunks, and you'll do just fine. Even if all you have done is tend to a few tomato plants on your window ledge, you can become an expert gardener; all it takes is a little time, patience, and practice. - - don't waste your time - By Anonymous User on 03-05-23 By: [Nydia Needham](/search?searchAuthor=Nydia+Needham&ref=a_pd_Unders_c5_adblp13npsbx_1_4_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=VBBWGJXPE7P9TSJ5ZVZA&pageLoadId=1HSNo9ODdStk1dCh&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Herbalism for Beginners - A Practical Guide on How to Improve Your Health by Using Inexpensive, Accessible Herbs - By: Indie Leaf Press - Narrated by: Grace Noble - Length: 6 hrs and 21 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story While conventional medicine is essential in treating many health problems, it's reassuring to know that you can also find relief through natural alternatives such as medicinal herbs. The hamster wheel of travel ball is a business model and not a baseball development model. For kids, baseball should be all about one thing—having fun! Y. Dou - Narrated by: Andrea Fuller - Length: 3 hrs and 57 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story Don't sign up for weight-loss surgery until you've read this guide! Between eating "healthy" and spending hours sweating in the gym, getting the scale to go down even a tiny bit takes loads of effort and patience. But imagine if you lost up to 70 percent of your excess weight in just one year. That's the power of bariatric surgery. While there are some risks to the procedure, you can minimize these risks by taking the four simple steps outlined in this guide. With the right information, you'll be able to lose the weight you've been struggling to put off once and for all. - - informative and not a cookbook - By Joanne Patricia on 06-12-23 By: [S. Y. Dou](/author/S-Y-Dou/B09SFS9JYC?ref=a_pd_Unders_c5_adblp13npsbx_2_2_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=VBBWGJXPE7P9TSJ5ZVZA&pageLoadId=1HSNo9ODdStk1dCh&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Ayurveda - Balance Your Body & Mind Using Natural Remedies and Mindfulness Meditation - By: Aghosh Prasan Subramani - Narrated by: Andrew Baldwin - Length: 3 hrs and 37 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story Within Ayurveda, all diseases and unhealthful conditions are the product of imbalances in the natural forces of life within the body, mind, and spirit of the person. The ultimate goal of ayurvedic medicine is to return these powers to their natural state of equilibrium. Ayurvedic medicine, also known as Ayurveda, is one of the oldest holistic healing systems in the world. It was established in India thousands of years ago. It is based on the principle that health and well-being depend on a delicate balance between mind, body, and spirit. - CBD Oil: The Real Miracle Is Coming - A Nice Guide to Improve Your Health, Here Explained the Differences Between Different Type of CBD Oil, Why and for What You Must Try It - By: Sherman Litt - Narrated by: Coz Green - Length: 1 hr and 13 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story CBD oil, or cannabidiol oil, is an extract made from the hemp plant, which is a member of the cannabis family. Many of the stigmas surrounding cannabis oil come from a misunderstanding about the classification of the plant. Yes, cannabis does produce marijuana buds. No, this does not mean that CBD oil will get you high. In fact, CBD oil does not contain enough THC to get you high. THC is the psychoactive component found in marijuana. CBD oil offers only the medicinal benefits. - - Extremely Prescribed Audible - By Joshua Marsh on 02-08-20 By: [Sherman Litt](/author/Sherman-Litt/B08371X3WP?ref=a_pd_Unders_c5_adblp13npsbx_2_4_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=VBBWGJXPE7P9TSJ5ZVZA&pageLoadId=1HSNo9ODdStk1dCh&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Amazingly Amusing A-Z Animal Facts for Kids (and Their Adults!) - Wildlife Biology with a Humorous Twist! - By: a Reluctant Mom - Narrated by: Hilary Buuck - Length: 3 hrs and 46 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story There are 1.371 million animal species on Earth, each with their own quirky characteristics. Keep listening to learn some bonkers and hysterical facts about a few of them! People won't protect things they don't love. People won't love things they don't know. Here's your kid's chance to get to know some awesome, amazing, and amusing animals! The world around us is fascinating, as is the wildlife in it. My goal is to inspire a love and respect for this planet that'll make the next generation socially and environmentally conscious and motivate them to protect the earth. - - Very Fun - By Tom on 05-03-22 By: [a Reluctant Mom](/author/a-Reluctant-Mom/B09NMH9ND5?ref=a_pd_Unders_c5_adblp13npsbx_2_5_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=VBBWGJXPE7P9TSJ5ZVZA&pageLoadId=1HSNo9ODdStk1dCh&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Heal with Ancient Herbs - Natural Way to Alternative Medicine & Herbalism to Heal Yourself That Could Save Your Life - By: Paul Simon - Narrated by: Rhonda Pownall - Length: 4 hrs and 43 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story You will learn how to produce herbal remedies and how to treat common disorders with this thorough alternative medicine for beginners audiobook. While utilizing herbs may appear complicated or expensive at first glance, this audiobook shows you how to prepare them in the same way you would prepare a meal. Following the recommendations in this audiobook will allow you to customize the qualities of each herb to meet your specific needs, resulting in a personalized approach to your family's health and well-being. By: [Paul Simon](/author/Paul-Simon/B09F72GKN2?ref=a_pd_Unders_c5_adblp13npsbx_2_6_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=VBBWGJXPE7P9TSJ5ZVZA&pageLoadId=1HSNo9ODdStk1dCh&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - The Comprehensive Herbalism Guide for Beginners - Learn How to Pick, Grow and Make Your Own Herbal Medicine in Only 3 Simple Steps - By: Tom Peace - Narrated by: Jane Ghazni - Length: 3 hrs and 43 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story Your body wants to be healthy, but that has become increasingly challenging due to our daily lifestyle. However, ignoring your body's health and relying entirely on conventional medicine to cover it is a mistake. Gladly, there is an alternative solution for that. - - Wonderful content! - By Wisdom on 02-15-23 By: [Tom Peace](/author/Tom-Peace/B0BKYCVH85?ref=a_pd_Unders_c5_adblp13npsbx_3_1_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=VBBWGJXPE7P9TSJ5ZVZA&pageLoadId=1HSNo9ODdStk1dCh&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - 365 Badass Black Men Affirmations - Daily Positive Thoughts to Increase Confidence, Create Wealth, Attract Success, and Boost Self-Esteem for the Powerful Black Man (Badass Black Affirmations) - By: Preston Greene, Jasmine Greene - Narrated by: Eddie Leonard Jr. - Length: 1 hr and 14 mins - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story Are you a Black man wanting to create more success, confidence, and happiness in your life? Has society made you feel like you are unworthy of all your dreams? You are not alone. In fact, many Black men are stuck in a negative place and constantly feel down on their luck, rejected, and disempowered. Some even feel it is impossible to stay positive and motivated in a broken society. But it doesn't have to be this way. It's no secret that the happiest and most successful people all have habits that they incorporate into their lives that help them stay focused and positive. - - Valuable content - By L. Z. on 02-12-23 By: [Preston Greene](/author/Preston-Greene/B09RQBZYBC?ref=a_pd_Unders_c5_adblp13npsbx_3_2_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=VBBWGJXPE7P9TSJ5ZVZA&pageLoadId=1HSNo9ODdStk1dCh&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1), and others - Powerful & Relaxing Morning Ritual with Affirmations for Women - Begin Your Day with Guided Meditation Scripts to Attract Positive Thoughts & Energy - By: Mindful Living Foundation - Narrated by: Natasha K - Length: 1 hr and 30 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story Affirmations are key to self-love and improvement, they're meant to give you a mental image of your potential and success! They're designed to carve a path for you to follow that leads to a life filled with positivity, gratitude, acceptance, confidence, strength, and more! - - Beautiful - By The Curious Reader on 05-09-22 - Parenting Strategies for Raising ADHD Children - Encourage Positive Behavior, Teach Self Regulation, Help Them Increase Their Focus and Easily Thrive in School - By: Elizabeth N. Jacobs - Narrated by: Dr. Michelle Carabache - Length: 3 hrs and 21 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story One minute everything is good; your child is calm and focused. But then, in the blink of an eye, something changes—now they're hysterical, screaming, and getting them to sit still for even half a second is suddenly impossible. Do you often sit there and worry about your child's temper, wishing there was something you could do to help them calm down a bit but not knowing where to start? Is their frustration leaving you frustrated, causing you both to spiral out of control? You're not alone. There are over 6.4 million parents feeling exactly what you are feeling right now. - - Attention Please - By Donesa Walker on 05-18-23 - ABC's of Herbal Medicine: Natural Remedies for Common Ailments - All You Need to Know About Herbs for Natural Ways of Healing Yourself - By: Caridad Del Rey - Narrated by: Jeff Bower - Length: 4 hrs and 32 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story Discover nature's secrets and find natural relief for whatever ails you. The key lies in understanding how these medicinal plants work and exploring the wide world of herbalism with a curious mind. The first step is to be open to the idea of there being a better way to manage health than the system you're using right now. By relying on resources found in the natural world, you're joining a long and storied tradition of healers who recognize the need for herbal medicine. - - Great Detailed Information - By Paula Andres on 06-16-23 By: [Caridad Del Rey](/search?searchAuthor=Caridad+Del+Rey&ref=a_pd_Unders_c5_adblp13npsbx_3_5_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=VBBWGJXPE7P9TSJ5ZVZA&pageLoadId=1HSNo9ODdStk1dCh&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Repairing the Heartbreak of Pet Loss Grief - 3 Phases of Healing After Losing Your Best Friend - By: C. Jeffrey - Narrated by: Lauren Garvin - Length: 3 hrs and 48 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story When you lose a pet, you lose a family member. It takes a piece of your heart you cannot get back. Experiencing this type of loss can feel incredibly isolating. That is why I am here for you. Together, we will get you through this tough time, heal your grief, and help you find the peace you are longing for. Repairing the Heartbreak of Pet Loss Grief teaches you to understand your grief, prepares you for the journey of self-discovery, helps you face your grief head-on and do what your pet would want you to do—go back to living with love and happiness in your heart. - - For all pet parents - By Momanator on 05-14-22 By: [C. Jeffrey](/author/C-Jeffrey/B09TZBNG8P?ref=a_pd_Unders_c5_adblp13npsbx_3_6_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=VBBWGJXPE7P9TSJ5ZVZA&pageLoadId=1HSNo9ODdStk1dCh&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) Publisher's summary If you want to skyrocket your health without wasting money on drugs that can do more harm than good, then keep reading.... Herbal medicine has been used for thousands of years, and it has been regaining in popularity recently, but it still has a long way to go behind allopathic medicine. But, what do our ancient traditions teach us? Are they all the same, and how do we know why or what works? There is limited research and evidence, yet we know many of the remedies, at the very least, help with prevention. Nowadays, pharmaceutical drugs are the go-to for every little symptom from headaches and coughs to depression and anxiety. Not only is overuse beginning to be a problem, but these pills can come with significant side effects, especially in the long run...and they hardly ever address the underlying condition of your symptoms. That's why we need to consider alternative treatments for our health. Herbal medicine works holistically. It is a way of life as much as a set of remedies. It strengthens your body, boosts your immune system, and restores your overall health. We have much to re-learn from our indigenous and ancient traditions and wisdom. By the end of this book, you will have an understanding of the energetic basis of vitalist and holistic medicine as well as the more common allopathic herbalist approach. In Herbal Remedies for Health and Healing for Beginners, there are over 70 herbs detailed that can help with over 20 common conditions, and most have some scientific basis and research that back their benefits. The approach is both allopathic and holistic. In Herbal Remedies for Health and Healing for Beginners, we lay the foundations of holistic and vitalist herbalism and outline the main teachings from our traditions—all of them support energetics—the foundation of why herbs and plants actually work. This is not a book that hides the benefits of allopathic medicine—there are many. It is an honest consideration of the value of herbs and plants for healing, and it will help you begin your journey—if you choose to take it. Even better? You can find it in nature for free! Learn the basics of herbalism and where it comes from and empower yourself to treat your own ailments with great success. In Herbal Remedies for Health and Healing for Beginners, you will discover: - How to treat 20+ ailments with the most powerful and easy-to-recognize herbal remedies that you can wildcraft or buy and use safely at home - A behind-the-scenes look at the demonization of herbal medicine in the early 1900s (understand how we got to where we are today) - Natural herbal alternatives to common Western drugs that are just as effective, come with no side effects, don't cost any money, and perhaps can even be grown in your backyard - The major differences between ancient and modern medicine—and the reason why modern medicine doesn't actually heal your body - The capitalist strategy behind Western medicine...and why so many patients get hooked on drugs without getting any better - An introduction to the four most powerful ancient traditional medicines - An in-depth introduction to the different types of herbal solutions (so you know what to use to treat your ailments—and when) - Three natural remedies that are safe to use at home for 25+ common health issues - And much more More from the same What listeners say about Understanding Herbal RemediesAverage customer ratings Reviews - Please select the tabs below to change the source of reviews. - Overall - Performance - Story - [Charles Baldwin](/listener/amzn1.account.AE546WYXNEXHN2DQI246OFN7AJYA?ref=a_pd_Unders_c15_rvlsnl_0&pf_rd_p=688a1b7e-3d44-49e7-a3fe-2be4c28264cd&pf_rd_r=VBBWGJXPE7P9TSJ5ZVZA&pageLoadId=1HSNo9ODdStk1dCh&creativeId=88c226af-6ce7-461c-9842-163d82e49648) - 04-29-22 Nothing better than natural remedies to cure you As a Native American, I studied natural remedies when I lived on the reservation with my grandfather, who was a medicine man.
